title: Rental Property
description: Welcome to 1914 N. Franklin Street.  This 3 BD 1.5 bath twin has so much charm and character with plenty of modern updates.  Immediately upon arrival, you will notice the pleasant curb appeal as well as the driveway, which provides 2-car parking!  Entering through the spacious, front porch, you are greeted by the large, open main living area, which boasts hardwood flooring and freshly painted walls.  Past the main living space, you will enter the kitchen, which features tile flooring and wood cabinets.  There is also a sizeable storage closet under the stairway.  Off the kitchen, is the backroom perfect for a formal dinning area or sitting area.  This space has gorgeous double patio doors that provide access to a nicely, sized privately fenced-in backyard.  The first floor also provides a half bath, laundry room/closet, and large coat closet.  Upstairs, you'll find the three, sizable, sun lit bedrooms and the full bath.  Each bedroom features carpet and incredibly spacious closets.  The full bath features a tub/shower combo, vanity, and a nice size linen closet with plenty of storage space.  This home is located on a quite street with friendly neighbors!  Close to Temple; perfect for Temple University or Temple Hospital employees!  Only a few blocks away from other popular neighborhoods with fine and casual dining, as well as brunch and cafe spots.  Located right near the Broad Street Line, very convenient for access to and from Center City.  This home is move-in ready so pack your bags and move right in.  Schedule your showing today!

title: This is an elegant entry vestibule unit at The Lenox Condominium, one
description: This is an elegant entry vestibule unit at The Lenox Condominium, one of the best pre-war buildings in the city. It also has one of the nicest layouts at the Lenox. It is a SE corner unit on a high floor with lots of windows, including 3 bay windows, great light and fantastic views. This unit is the largest one-bedroom in the building and has the same square footage as most two bedrooms units. The vestibule, large rooms and high ceilings give the home a grand look and feel. One side of the vestibule leads to a spacious living room with built in bookcases and two bay windows, a formal dining room and a beautiful kitchen. The fully renovated kitchen includes custom cabinets, stainless steel appliances, ceramic tile flooring and granite countertops. The other side of the vestibule has a huge bedroom that has a den, built in bookcases, walk-in-closet and a bay window. The master bedroom has a closet organizing system.

title: Sunny 1 bedroom condo WITH POOL and courtyard available now in the rar
description: Sunny 1 bedroom condo WITH POOL and courtyard available now in the rarely offered Strickland court condominiums located in the heart of Washington square west. Upon entry you will admire the old Philadelphia charm and history of this converted brownstone that retains many of its original details. Entering the unit you will be impressed by the open floor plan, high ceilings, and giant windows that soak this space in tons of natural light. This space opens up to a large kitchen with a large pantry and ample counter space. Moving through the hallway you will find a full bathroom and storage closet that has an in unit washer dryer. title: Extravagant 3 bed 3 bath bi-level apt w/parking space in Brewerytown!
description:
3106 Clifford St #1 – Luxury 3 bed 3 bath home with parking space!
Gorgeous luxury 3 bed 3 bath bi-level apt in Brewerytown area, just a block from Fairmount Park is the perfect place to create new memories! This brand new first and sub level unit atop wonderful hardwood flooring is a one half of a 2 unit modern architectural space, curated with an eclectic mixture of contemporary fixtures amidst a ton of amenities for a higher quality of living. Now imagine you live here! The perfect spot to explore the city on foot, bicycle, or however, you choose.
The first bedroom (10’7″ x 9’6″) sits at the front part of the main level and while big windows are obvious at first sight, ample closet space are one of its best assets! A full bathroom with a stand up shower also sits on the main level. Discover an extravagant kitchen with quartz countertops, sleek white cabinetry, a breakfast bar and stainless-steel appliances including: a refrigerator, microwave, gas stove, dishwasher–which create an ideal setting for meal preparation. The kitchen and living room area make up a bright and open concept floorplan and just off the living room a back entrance/exit which leads out to the driveway wherein your own parking space exists to relieve the parking woes we the citizens of Philadelphia have had bestowed upon us.
The sublevel includes 2 bedrooms (1 bedroom with an ensuite bathroom) located on opposite ends, closet space, a slate tiled bathroom with a large stand up shower, a stacked washer/dryer atop hardwood flooring. 2nd bedroom (12’4”x11’8”) located on the front part of the sublevel, includes closet space. 3rd bedroom (12’3”x12’4”) located in the rear of the sublevel as an ensuite bathroom with a tiled stand up shower, as well as, tons of sunlight.

title: Renovated Studio Apartment Home with South-Facing Windows
description:
The unfurnished studio apartment home at 2510 is available for lease at this moment! This 400 square foot Dali studio apartment home on the 25th floor features large windows that face south and have a Chancellor Street view including a peak of South Philadelphia in between high-rise buildings. We plan to renovate this particular home. Be the first to enjoy new renovations! This renovated kitchen will be nice with its white cabinets and granite counters. This kitchen will be fully-equipped with a gas stove, microwave, disposal, and dishwasher. This home will have wood floors. Move into your new home as early as February 15, 2023!
All utilities, except for cable and internet, are included. You have your choice of cable and/or internet provider.
Our amenities are amazing! This community offers a sauna, package room, lounge, fitness center, fitness/yoga studio, dog spa, guest suites, and bicycle storage. Lounge 201 includes a pool table, media room, printer/copier, conference room, demonstration kitchen, dining area, and cozy seating areas. Plus, we are renovating our roof deck! There is a front door attendant and a front desk concierge. In this building, there is a laundry room on every floor. Plus, you may do multiple loads of laundry at the same time in our large laundry facility on the third floor. We have an attached parking garage! Please note that this valet parking garage is not managed by this community, so the monthly parking fee is separate.
This building has such a convenient location! Nearby grocery stores and food markets are Trader Joe's, Giant, Rittenhouse Market, Aldi, Giant Heirloom Market, Aldi, Acme, Whole Foods, Spruce Food Market, Sue's Produce Market, Venditore by Giordano, Maxx's Produce, Di Bruno Bros., and the Reading Terminal Market. There are a couple of Fine Wine & Good Spirits locations nearby. Shop at retail shops on Rittenhouse Row like Anthropologie, Lovesac, and L'Occitane en Provence. Dine out at the restaurants on the block: Rouge, Devon, and Parc. Restaurant Aleksandar, Twenty Manning, and Marathon on the Square are also in the neighborhood. Indulge in a weekend brunch at Green Eggs. Buy a scone or brookie from The Bakeshop on 20th. Savor a cappuccino at K'Far Cafe, Bottega Rittenhouse, and Elixr. Relax in the park at Rittenhouse Square.
Wondering if this home is still available for rent at the Rittenhouse Claridge? Visit our website at rittenhouseclaridge.com to check if 2510 is still listed under the Dali floor plan! Please make an appointment to tour with Michelle or Gabby using ResMate, our chatbot concierge, on our website at rittenhouseclaridge.com.
Price posted is for the 22 month lease term.
For an unfurnished home, 2 to 22 month lease terms are available!
Rental rates, availability, and apartment home features are subject to change without notice.
We can furnish a home for you over 2 weeks following rental application approval and after the home is made ready. Please note that there is a 3 month lease term minimum for a furnished home. You would pay a furnished rent instead of an unfurnished rent. We can calculate this furnished rent for you based upon your choices of home furnishings.
Welcome home!

Apt. 1515 - Trafalgar floor plan — 1,452 sq. ft. —$4,038
This large 5th floor 2 bedroom/2 bathroom apartment has so much to offer! This apartment comes with LVT flooring, central heat and air, a laundry room with washer and dryer, stainless steel appliances, and a private balcony outside of the living area. The master bedroom is equipped with a walk-in closet and generously-sized bathroom lined with granite countertops. The guest bathroom is equally as spacious! This beautiful apartment is within close proximity is our clubhouse that features a 24-hour fitness center, theatre room, resort-style swimming pool, and so much more!
Our leasing office is open 7 days a week – call  show contact info
to schedule a tour today!

title: Bright Studio Apartment Home on Rittenhouse Square, Short Term Lease
description:
This 475 square foot Monet studio apartment home at 903 on the 9th floor features large windows that face east for morning sunshine and afternoon shade and have a view looking down Walnut Street with skyscrapers to the left. This renovated kitchen is nice with its white cabinets and granite countertops. This kitchen is fully-equipped with a dishwasher, disposal, microwave, and gas stove. The renovated bathroom tile is white. This home has neutral carpet. The Rittenhouse Claridge is located on Rittenhouse Square. Move into your new home immediately!
Please note that you may only stay in this specific home for either two or three months due to our planned Da Vinci two bedroom two bathroom apartment home construction project. You must move out of this specific home at 903 on or before April 20, 2023.
The Rittenhouse Claridge offers you the opportunity to live in Philadelphia’s most vibrant, walkable neighborhood. So close to shopping, dining, cafes, and more! The closest grocery store is Rittenhouse Market at 18th and Spruce. Trader Joe's and Giant are also in the area. Shop at the retail stores on Rittenhouse Row such as Anthropologie, Lagos, Tumi, Tiffany & Co., Brooklinen, Lovesac, Athleta, lululemon, Indochino, Glossier, Vans, L'Occitane en Provence, and CB2. There are a couple locations of Fine Wine & Good Spirits nearby. Dine at Rouge in the building! Savor a cup of coffee at La Colombe, K'Far Cafe, Bluestone Lane, Ultimo and Elixr. Indulge in ice cream at Jeni's. Wander around the Mütter Museum. Relax with a manicure at Coco Blue Spruce. Shop for fresh flowers and seasonal produce at the weekly farmer's market every Saturday. There is so much to do in this area!

title: Furnished One Bedroom
description:
Korman Residential on the Main Line are beautiful apartments in Haverford, PA. We offer unique, spacious floor plan options, and whether you are looking for a MicroSuite, studio, or one-bedroom apartment, each of our rentals has hardwood floors and walk-in closets. The kitchens have fabulous cabinets and countertops with built-in appliances. You’ll love the exceptional curbside appeal. Built in 1926, and once a hotel named Casa Del Sol, our building is listed on the National Historic Register. Our apartments for rent on the Main Line are near Villanova University and located in Lower Merion School District. Located less than 10 miles from Center City, our rentals appeal to Philadelphia apartment shoppers. In addition to traditional residential apartments, we provide corporate and furnished options, and every one includes a long list of great amenities. Living in Haverford, PA at Korman Residential on the Main Line places you two blocks from SEPTA’s regional rail station and close to major roadways so traveling to the city and the surrounding suburbs is convenient. Contact a leasing agent to schedule a personal tour of our Haverford apartments.
